title: Kadhal Enbadhai Lyrics Kullanari Koottam Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Singer: Hariharan
Song : Kadhal Enbadhai
Movie: Kullanari Koottam
Lyrics : Suryaprabhakar

Kadhal Enbadhai Kadhal Enbadhai
Muthathil koduthu vittaai
Kadhal Enbadhai Kadhal Enbadhai
Mounathil solli vittai
Nan unnai ninaithaal poovaagum manadhu
Ennulle irukkum uyir kooda unadhu
Un swasam koduthaai manmeedhu vazha
Idhu onre podhum vinnai naan azha
ennamo nenjukula sandhosam iruka
idhu enna adhisayam uyir mattum nadakka

Kadhal Enbadhai Kadhal Enbadhai
Muthathil koduthu vittaai
Kadhal Enbadhai Kadhal Enbadhai
Mounathil solli vittai

Ne nadandha padhayayai en kalgal thedum
Partha idamellam en paarvai parkkum
Pirivendru ninaithu piriyaamal ponaai
Thoorathil ne irundhu ennai thottu anaithaai
Pirivendru ninaithu piriyaamal ponaai
Thoorathil ne irundhu ennai thottu anaithaai
ennamo nenjukula sandhosam iruka
idhu enna adhisayam uyir mattum nadakka

Kadhal Enbadhai Kadhal Enbadhai
Muthathil koduthu vittaai

Nerupin thooram thaan neerodu mudiyum
ozhiyin thooram thaan kaatrodu mudiyum
kaatrin thooramo boomiyil mudiyum
en kadhal thooramo unnulle adangum
kaatrin thooramo boomiyil mudiyum
en kadhal thooramo unnulle adangum
ennamo nenjukula sandhosam iruka
idhu enna adhisayam uyir mattum nadakka
